text:
I would like to know if it is possible to achieve the below:
1. Developers provides an excel file with the details for thread group, URL to hit, Headers to be set, etc
2. Somehow we generate the jxm file from this excel and use it as the test plan?

Thanks
creator: nitin.chawke@gmail.com
